aboutData.title: Hi There! I'm Shair Ali
aboutData.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
aboutData.text: I am a Software Engineer and Freelance Developer with a strong focus on building custom digital solutions. I build many projects during my freelance Journey you can find some of them bellow, My work combines clean code, modern design, and smart functionality to create applications that not only perform flawlessly but also deliver real impact. I aim to craft digital experiences that attract, inspire, and motivate users to engage, turning ideas into powerful, practical, and scalable solutions.

details.title: Freelance
details.info: Level 1 at Fiverr Check out my Clients feedback

services.title: Custom Web Development
services.text: Building modern, scalable, and high-performing web applications using React, Node.js, and REST APIs.

services.title: UI/UX Design
services.text: Designing clean, user-friendly, and conversion-focused interfaces with attention to detail and user journey optimization.

services.title: E-Commerce Solutions
services.text: Developing full-featured marketplaces, multi-vendor platforms, and secure online stores with seamless payment integration.

services.title: Website Hosting & Deployment
services.text: Experienced in hosting and deploying websites on AWS virtual machines using Nginx, ensuring fast, secure, and reliable performance.

services.title: Desktop Applications
services.text: Building powerful, user-friendly desktop applications, tailored to your workflows and business needs,if user want a UI and functionality

services.title: Optimization & Maintenance
services.text: Ensuring websites and apps run flawlessly with speed optimization, bug fixes, and ongoing technical support.

skillData.title: Technical Skills & Expertise
skillData.text: I specialize in delivering end-to-end digital solutions from Python desktop GUIs to modern full-stack web applications, intelligent chatbots, and production-grade deployments on AWS with Nginx. My expertise bridges strong backend logic with seamless frontend interfaces and real-world deployment practices. Some of my featured works include Grand Hotel Selinunte, a full-scale Hotel website; its integrated WhatsApp-supported chatbot and Talk an AI-powered conversational chatbot

portfolioItems.imageAlt: Grand Hotel Selinunte website preview on laptop and phone
portfolioItems.title: Grand Hotel Selinunte Website
portfolioItems.subTitle: Luxury hotel platform with conversion focused booking journey
portfolioItems.description: Designed and engineered the official Grand Hotel Selinunte website with a high-performing booking flow, multilingual content strategy, and on-page SEO tuned for hospitality keywords.

portfolioItems.imageAlt: WhatsApp chatbot conversation shown on multiple devices
portfolioItems.title: AI Concierge & Customer Support
portfolioItems.subTitle: 24/7 WhatsApp automation for hospitality
portfolioItems.description: Built an AI-powered concierge that handles reservations, upsells spa services, and automatically responds in five languages while syncing to the hotel PMS.

portfolioItems.imageAlt: Dashboard interface for estimate and invoice automation tool
portfolioItems.title: Estimate & Receipt Generator
portfolioItems.subTitle: Finance automation for hotel operations
portfolioItems.description: Developed a secure internal web portal that auto-calculates stay costs, produces branded quotes in PDF, and emails receipts without manual formatting.

portfolioItems.imageAlt: Talk to Jesus AI chat interface
portfolioItems.title: Talk to Jesus – AI Experience
portfolioItems.subTitle: Faith based conversational AI with ethical guardrails
portfolioItems.description: Crafted an immersive AI companion that blends curated theology content with empathetic responses, optimized for fast voice synthesis and accessibility.

portfolioItems.imageAlt: Accessible camera mobile interface with filters
portfolioItems.title: Accessible Camera App
portfolioItems.subTitle: Mobile accessibility toolkit for inclusive media
portfolioItems.description: Launched a cross-platform camera experience featuring live color grading, dyslexia-friendly overlays, and preset management for creators with low vision.

portfolioItems.title: NSL Buzzer System
portfolioItems.subTitle: Gamified quiz master for live events
portfolioItems.description: Delivered a real-time quiz control center with HDMI mirroring, latency under 30ms, and responsive scoreboard animations for school tournaments.

portfolioItems.imageAlt: Analytics dashboard for growth marketing automation
portfolioItems.title: Growth Marketing Intelligence
portfolioItems.subTitle: Marketing analytics with predictive scoring
portfolioItems.description: Implemented a marketing intelligence hub that consolidates ads, CRM, and web analytics, surfacing actionable growth recommendations through predictive scoring.

portfolioItems.imageAlt: Portfolio of SaaS landing pages on multiple screens
portfolioItems.title: SaaS Launch System
portfolioItems.subTitle: Component library for rapid SaaS launches
portfolioItems.description: Engineered a design system and deployment pipeline that ships polished SaaS marketing sites with integrated analytics, SEO schema, and localization in minutes.

portfolioItems.imageAlt: Mobile banking experience mockup on smartphone
portfolioItems.title: Fintech Customer Onboarding
portfolioItems.subTitle: Biometric onboarding with risk monitoring
portfolioItems.description: Architected a frictionless onboarding journey for a fintech startup including biometric verification, automated AML checks, and audit-ready compliance logging.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.subTitle: Grand Hotel Selinunte
experience.text: Developed and deployed the official Grand Hotel Selinunte website with a modern booking system, custom chatbot with WhatsApp integration, and a fully responsive user experience. Handled end-to-end development including frontend, backend, and AWS Nginx deployment.

experience.title: AI Chat Support Developer
experience.subTitle: Grand Hotel Selinunte
experience.text: Built and integrated an AI-powered chat support system with seamless WhatsApp integration for Grand Hotel Selinunte. Designed to handle guest queries, booking assistance, and real-time support, providing a personalized and efficient communication channel between the hotel and its customers.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.subTitle: Grand Hotel Selinunte
experience.text: Developed internal tools for the Grand Hotel Selinunte support team, including a PDF generator, receipt generator, and a smart cost calculator to instantly provide guests with accurate stay costs. These tools streamlined the workflow, reduced manual effort, and improved customer service efficiency.

experience.title: Talk to Jesus - AI Chat Experience
experience.subTitle: Grand Hotel Selinunte
experience.text: Created an innovative AI-driven project called 'Talk to Jesus', offering guests and users a unique interactive chat experience. The system simulates spiritual conversations, blending advanced AI with a meaningful user interface, extending the hotel's digital engagement beyond traditional hospitality tools.

education.title: BS Computer Science CGPA (3.75)
education.subTitle: Riphah International Univercity.
education.text: During my studies, I developed numerous projects, including my Final Year Project a complete social media application featuring image and text posts, public commenting, messaging, friend requests, and other core social networking functionalities

education.title: Diploma in Computer Science
education.subTitle: PAST Institution
education.text: After completing my FSC, I pursued a computer diploma that ignited my passion for computer science even further. Since then, I’ve always enjoyed what I do, striving to create unique solutions while constantly learning and evolving.

education.title: Keep Moving Forward
education.text: Do you know why sharks keep moving? They must, or they won’t survive. In the same way, I believe in continuous growth always moving forward, always seeking knowledge, and always pushing myself to do the hardest things.

contactData.title: Contact Info
contactData.subTitle: Visite my social profile and get connected
contactData.text: If you want to turn any idea into reality, feel free to contact me and let’s get it done ASAP.
